data.actual_result: They update at different times. The indicator in the list updates before the indicator in the icon.
data.expected_result: The mention indicator in the icon and the mentions indicator in the list update together.
data.short_description: The mentions indicator in the channel/DM icon and the channel/DM list in the quick switcher update at different times.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone spam in your DMs. - Quickly open quick switcher. - Observe.
